channel.title: ELP Television
channel.itunes:subtitle: Ashtabula-area TV
channel.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
channel.itunes:summary: Online television network offering public domain and Creative Commons-licensed video content from the Internet Archive in addition to Ashtabula-area produced shows.
channel.description: Online television network offering public domain and Creative Commons-licensed video content from the Internet Archive in addition to Ashtabula-area produced shows.
channel.itunes:keywords: video on demand, Ashtabula, special services, Internet Archive

item.title: Service Suspension
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Service Suspension
item.itunes:summary: Due to the burdens of attempting to both mitigate the fallout of cyber operations from the Russia-Ukraine conflict as well as continue with updates to this service, we have chosen to suspend this service so that we can continue with handling security matters. Too many strange things have been happening online and we need to continue our efforts in hardening systems. The expected restoration of this service is post-conflict, we hope.
item.description:
Due to the burdens of attempting to both mitigate the fallout of cyber operations from the Russia-Ukraine conflict as well as continue with updates to this service, we have chosen to suspend this service so that we can continue with handling security matters. Too many strange things have been happening online and we need to continue our efforts in hardening systems. The expected restoration of this service is post-conflict, we hope.
Show notes available in the post at https://coyote.works/2022/Hiatus.html.

item.title: Lessons Learned from a Ransomware Attack
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Lessons Learned from a Ransomware Attack
item.itunes:summary: Even though it was news recently with the Ashtabula County Medical Center and the City of Geneva it stands to reason that we can learn from how others handle ransomware attacks and learn from what lessons they learned. This event from the Seattle GNU/Linux Conference in 2021 provides some background for us in that area.
item.description:
Even though it was news recently with the Ashtabula County Medical Center and the City of Geneva it stands to reason that we can learn from how others handle ransomware attacks and learn from what lessons they learned. This event from the Seattle GNU/Linux Conference in 2021 provides some background for us in that area.
Show notes available in the post at https://coyote.works/2022/SeaGLRansomwareTalk.html.

item.title: Santa and the Fairy Snow Queen
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Santa and the Fairy Snow Queen
item.itunes:summary: Before today's cookie cutter holiday films from a certain television network named for a greeting card company it seems filmmakers of the past liked to indulge in making what can best be described as nightmare fuel. This short comes from producer Sid Davis who is more well known for quite heavy-handed productions in the educational films realm.
item.description:
Before today's cookie cutter holiday films from a certain television network named for a greeting card company it seems filmmakers of the past liked to indulge in making what can best be described as nightmare fuel. This short comes from producer Sid Davis who is more well known for quite heavy-handed productions in the educational films realm.
Show notes available in the post at https://coyote.works/2021/FairySnowQueen.html.

item.title: Rudolph, The Red-Nosed Reindeer
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Rudolph, The Red-Nosed Reindeer
item.itunes:summary: Directed by Max Fleischer for the Jam Handy Organization, we hear a rendering of the story of Rudolph. What could go wrong?

item.title: Son of the Navy
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Son of the Navy
item.itunes:summary: We're going to continue with our Christmas theme. Although not overtly a Christmas film, this feature film gives us an orphan and a sailor building bonds on a cross-country road trip. Is the kid actually the sailor's son? Is something else going on? Watch and see.
item.description:
We're going to continue with our Christmas theme. Although not overtly a Christmas film, this feature film gives us an orphan and a sailor building bonds on a cross-country road trip. Is the kid actually the sailor's son? Is something else going on? Watch and see.
Show notes available in the post at https://coyote.works/2021/Son-of-the-Navy.html.

item.title: Rocky Jones, Space Ranger -- Crash of the Moons
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Rocky Jones, Space Ranger -- Crash of the Moons
item.itunes:summary: Switching gears with this pick, we wind up turning to Rocky Jones. This is a glimpse at a future that never was. The concept of a Secretary of Space is kinda nice and perhaps we may end up adopting that some day in our own timeline. This is a 1950s retro romp through the galaxy so prepare for blast off!
item.description:
Switching gears with this pick, we wind up turning to Rocky Jones. This is a glimpse at a future that never was. The concept of a Secretary of Space is kinda nice and perhaps we may end up adopting that some day in our own timeline. This is a 1950s retro romp through the galaxy so prepare for blast off!
Show notes available in the post at https://coyote.works/2021/RockyJones.html.
